column7: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You gain 2 life.
column14: First-years quickly learn how the Vastlands earned its name.

column7: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. It gains vigilance until end of turn.
column14: "Changing the equation from incremental to exponential was a stroke of genius on my part."

column7: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller draws a card.
column14:
"I've never seen a student fail quite so spectacularly. There's potential in that."
—Hostram, professor of arcanochemistry
Final grades are posted on the first day of class.

column7: Create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying, a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token, and a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
column14:
"Don't just win the game. Win the crowd."
—Moriana, Mage Tower coach
